name: Design Direct UK
tagline: Web Applications, Mobile Apps & Software Solutions
description:
Based in London Design Direct UK offers custom web & mobile solutions for start-ups and enterprises across the globe. Over the last 10+ years we successfully helped 500+ clients across the globe for getting their business to the next level. 
With a professional team of 30+ dedicated developers and is growing we can deliver custom solutions for your business of any size and complexity.
We mainly focus on the development of custom web applications, enterprise mobile apps, business software products, E-commerce solutions and digital marketing services. 
We believe success is based on our clients, that's why our strategy is directed on you. Our approach is designed to provide clients an organised process that is simple, supportive, informative and flexible.
